peril.views.slick.components

Class VisualList.Element

  • java.lang.Object
    • peril.views.slick.util.Viewable
      • peril.views.slick.util.Clickable
        • peril.views.slick.components.VisualList.Element
  • Enclosing class:
    VisualList<T>

    private final class VisualList.Element
extends Clickable
    An element of the VisualList that can be displayed on screen using draw(Frame, Font, int). This element wraps <T>.
    Since:
    2018-02-23
    Version:
    1.01.01
    Author:
    Joshua_Eddy
    See Also:
    Clickable

      • draw

        public void draw(Frame frame,
                 Font font,
                 int padding)
        Draws the name of the VisualList.Element on screen.
        Parameters:
        frame - The Frame that draws this VisualList.Element on screen.
        font - The Font that the element will be drawn in.
        padding - The number of pixels to the left of this VisualList.Elements Point position this will be displayed.
